name: Spell Roller (Reupload)
description:
[This is a resubmission of our GMTK 2022 Game Jam game. Due to a submission error, we had to reupload it.  We understand that this doesn't qualify for the Game Jam, we just wanted it here for prosperity's sake]

Hello!

This game is very unfinished and lacking, but we are very proud of it! This is our first game jam and it was a very fun, stressful, and rewarding experience. For anyone taking the time to play our crappy, broken, silly game, we are extremely grateful! 

Controls: WASD - move. Right MSB: roll dice. Left MSB: cast spell. ESC: Exit

(The intention was, the number rolled on the die would determine a unique spell attack, but because of time and inexperience, the only spell is a fire ball attack [and it doesn't even do anything haha])

Much love,

- Derick: Arist. - Rav: Dev. - Darren: Dev
